divs: Sighting DetailsMorning.., no concept of time when camping, saw circle directly across the neighboring ridgeline, maybe 3 miles away... not sure of distance, before the words could come out of my mouth to indicate the existance of it to my significant other, ... it began to set like the sun behind the treetops. By the time I had finished saying, "xxxxx, look at that and tell me what you think, it was gone". Only rational explanation was a high tech satelite dish that was in a submersable mode at the time. Felt exposed to the occurence due to the visibility range and close proximity. Closest campers were faced at a different angle around the mountain and three quarters of a mile from us.
trends: There have been no other sightings in 11 mile
This sighting has never been favorited.
